name: tentree TreeFleece Banshee Hoodie - Women's
description:
Comfort for your body and your mind. Made of super-soft TreeFleece blend of recycled and natural fibres, this is a hoodie you can feel good about.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Regular fit feels just right.
